description:
Minamino Mikako is a photographer on Atamistar, and a former member of AKB0048, known as Minegishi Minami the 5th. She was made Center Nova but then left shortly after.
As of episode 22 (episode 9 of Next Stage), she returns to the group as a probational understudy, using the name Minamino Mikako, although others (like Tsubasa) still call her Mii-chan (Minegishi Minami`s nickname)
name: Minamino Mikako
